description:
Mutes the user specified in the ID parameter for the authenticating user.

Returns the muted user when successful. Returns a string describing the failure condition when unsuccessful.

Actions taken in this method are asynchronous. Changes will be eventually consistent.

parameters.description: The screen name of the potentially muted user. Helpful for disambiguating when a valid screen name is also a user ID.
parameters.name: screen_name

parameters.description: The ID of the potentially muted user. Helpful for disambiguating when a valid user ID is also a valid screen name.
parameters.name: user_id
